description: Render an example of deeply-nested spacers in the evaluation viewer.
name: spacers.json

spacers.name: Spacers
spacers.script:
OP_IF
  <1> OP_IF
  <
    $(<'eval_1'>      
        <$(
            <'eval_2'>
            <1> OP_IF
              OP_DROP
              <'inner_if'>
            OP_ENDIF
        )>
        OP_2DROP
        <1> OP_IF
          <'if_1'>
          <1> OP_IF
            <'if_2'>
          OP_ENDIF 
        OP_DROP
        OP_ENDIF
    )
  > // push happens after this line
  OP_ELSE <'never'>
  OP_ENDIF
OP_ELSE
  <0>
OP_ELSE <'Multiple OP_ELSE quirk'> OP_DROP
OP_ELSE OP_NOT
OP_ENDIF 
OP_0NOTEQUAL
